# Changes to PostCSS Color Hex Alpha

### 9.0.3

_December 15, 2023_

- Fix type definitions

### 9.0.2

_February 6, 2023_

- Reduce the amount of duplicate fallback CSS.

### 9.0.1

_January 28, 2023_

- Improve `types` declaration in `package.json`
